# Welcome {.unnumbered}

## Welcome to documentation about the VEDA API and Datasets

This website provides documentation and example notebooks for the various APIs for the datasets maintained by NASA VEDA project.

You can run the notebooks with 
<a href="https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/nasa-impact/veda-documentation/HEAD"><img src="https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg" alt="MyBinder link." target="_blank"></a>

or locally via:

```
pip3 install -r requirements
jupyter notebook
```
